mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MT_SEQ ASC) RNUM , MT_SEQ , MEM_ID , MT_CONST , MT_LOCATION , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') REG_DT , MT_STATUS , TO_CHAR(PRCS_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') PRCS_DT , MT_NOTE FROM MAINTENANCE WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY RNUM DESC

SELECT A.MT_SEQ , B.MEM_NM , D.DANJI_NAME , D.ADDR , SUBSTR(B.ROOM_CODE, 6, 3) AS DONG_CODE , SUBSTR(B.ROOM_CODE, 10) AS ROOM_CODE , B.MEM_TELNO , A.MT_CONST , A.MT_DETAIL , A.MT_LOCATION , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DT , A.MT_STATUS , TO_CHAR(A.PRCS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRCS_DT , A.STATUS_CONTENT , C.CCPY_CODE , C.CCPY_NAME , C.CCPY_TELNO , C.CCPY_POST , C.CCPY_ADDR , C.CCPY_ADDR_DETAIL , C.BIZ_REG_NO , D.FILE_NAME FROM MAINTENANCE A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACH D ON(A.ATTACH = D.GLOBAL_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER B ON A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CCPY C ON A.CCPY_CODE = C.CCPY_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN DANJI D ON D.DANJI_CODE = SUBSTR(B.ROOM_CODE, 1, 4) WHERE MT_SEQ = #{mtSeq}

SELECT A.MEM_NM, B.DANJI_NAME, B.ADDR, SUBSTR(A.ROOM_CODE, 10) AS ROOM_CODE, SUBSTR(A.ROOM_CODE, 6, 3) AS DONG_CODE, A.MEM_TELNO FROM MEMBER A LEFT OUTER JOIN DANJI B ON B.DANJI_CODE = SUBSTR(A.ROOM_CODE, 1, 4) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAINTENANCE ( MT_SEQ , MT_CONST , MT_LOCATION , MT_DETAIL , MEM_ID , REG_DT , MT_STATUS , ATTACH ) VALUES( #{mtSeq}, #{mtConst}, #{mtLocation}, #{mtDetail}, #{memId}, SYSDATE, '접수완료', #{attach} )
mapper.select: SELECT 'MT' || LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MT_SEQ, 3))), 0) + 1, 4, '0') AS MT_SEQ FROM MAINTENANCE

SELECT A.MT_SEQ , B.CCPY_CODE , B.CCPY_NAME , B.CCPY_TELNO , B.CCPY_ADDR , B.CCPY_ADDR_DETAIL , B.BIZ_REG_NO , C.MEM_NM , SUBSTR(C.ROOM_CODE, 10) AS ROOM_CODE , SUBSTR(C.ROOM_CODE, 6, 3) AS DONG_CODE , C.MEM_TELNO , A.MT_CONST , A.MT_LOCATION , A.MT_DETAIL , A.MT_STATUS , A.STATUS_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(A.PRCS_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD')PRCS_DT , A.ATTACH FROM MAINTENANCE A LEFT OUTER JOIN CCPY B ON A.CCPY_CODE = B.CCPY_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER C ON A.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID
WHERE A.MT_SEQ = #{mtSeq}
SELECT FILE_NAME FROM ATTACH WHERE GLOBAL_CODE = #{attach}
mapper.update: UPDATE MAINTENANCE SET MT_STATUS = #{mtStatus}, STATUS_CONTENT = #{statusContent}, PRCS_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MT_SEQ = #{mtSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT mt_seq , cancel_yn , MT_STATUS FROM maintenance where cancel_yn = 'N'
SELECT MT_STATUS, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MAINTENANCE GROUP BY MT_STATUS
SELECT MEM_ID FROM MAINTENANCE WHERE MT_SEQ = #{mtSeq}
